rules.6x6: Place a digit from 1 to 6 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 2x3 outlined box. The digits inside each square wheel must be located in those four cells in the given order. Square wheels can be rotated, but not reflected.
rules.9x9: Place a digit from 1 to 9 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 3x3 outlined box. The digits inside each square wheel must be located in those four cells in the given order. Square wheels can be rotated, but not reflected.
